subScenes.name: 预约咨询
subScenes.description: 学生预约学术顾问面谈毕业事宜

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi, I'm calling to book a slot for my graduation checklist meeting.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你好，我想预约一个毕业清单面谈的时间。

responses.text: Sure, how about Wednesday at 3 PM?
responses.text_cn: 当然，周三下午三点可以吗？

responses.text: Could I do Thursday instead? I've got class then.
responses.text_cn: 能改到周四吗？我那天有课。

responses.text: Anytime next week works.

qaPairs.usageNote: 预约时提供可选时间更高效

qaPairs.speakerText: You'll need to bring your transcript and thesis outline.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你得带上成绩单和论文提纲。

responses.text: Got it—I'll print them out tonight.
Wait, do you mean the final draft or just the proposal?
responses.text_cn: 等等，你说的是终稿还是开题报告？

responses.text: Thanks, I'll check the portal.

qaPairs.usageNote: 确认材料时要明确版本要求

subScenes.name: 确认学分
subScenes.description: 核对是否满足毕业所需学分

qaPairs.speakerText: You're missing 3 credits in core courses—did you take Advanced Research Methods?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你核心课还差3学分，你修过高级研究方法了吗？

responses.text: Oh no—I thought I’d already taken it. Can I enroll now?
responses.text_cn: 天哪，我以为修过了，现在还能选吗？

responses.text: Is there a waiver if I’ve done similar work abroad?
responses.text_cn: 如果我在国外修过类似课程，能豁免吗？

responses.text: I'll check my transcript right away.

qaPairs.usageNote: 缺学分时主动询问替代方案

qaPairs.speakerText: You can swap one elective for a core if you submit a petition by Friday.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 如果你周五前提交申请，可以用一门选修替换核心课。

responses.text: That’s a lifesaver! Where’s the form?
Do I need a professor’s signature?
Got it, I’ll handle it.

qaPairs.usageNote: 申请替代方案时确认流程细节

subScenes.name: 论文提交
subScenes.description: 确认论文格式与提交截止时间

qaPairs.speakerText: Your thesis must be in APA 7th edition and uploaded to the GradPortal by May 15.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你的论文必须用APA第七版格式，5月15日前上传到毕业门户。

responses.text: Wait, does the abstract count toward the word limit?
responses.text_cn: 等等，摘要算在字数限制里吗？

responses.text: Can I submit a draft first for feedback?
responses.text_cn: 能先交个初稿来反馈吗？

responses.text: Thanks—I’ll double-check the template.
responses.text_cn: 谢谢，我再核对一下模板。

qaPairs.usageNote: 确认格式细节避免被退回

qaPairs.speakerText: Late submissions get a 10% grade penalty unless you have extenuating circumstances.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 逾期提交会扣10%成绩，除非有特殊原因。

responses.text: I’m worried I won’t finish on time—what counts as extenuating?
responses.text_cn: 我怕赶不上，什么算特殊原因？

responses.text: I’ve got a doctor’s note—I’ll email it tomorrow.
responses.text_cn: 我有医生证明，明天就发邮件。

responses.text: Understood. I’m on it.

qaPairs.usageNote: 提及特殊情况需提前准备证明

subScenes.name: 支付费用
subScenes.description: 确认毕业相关费用与支付方式

qaPairs.speakerText: There’s a $150 graduation fee—paid online via the student portal.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 有150美元毕业费，需通过学生门户在线支付。

responses.text: Can I pay in installments? I’m short on cash right now.
responses.text_cn: 能分期付吗？我现在手头紧。

responses.text: Is this fee refundable if I don’t graduate?
responses.text_cn: 如果我不毕业，这笔费用能退吗？

responses.text: I’ll pay it tonight.

qaPairs.usageNote: 支付前确认是否可退或分期

qaPairs.speakerText: Payment confirmation takes 24 hours—don’t wait till the last minute.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 支付确认需24小时，别拖到最后一刻。

responses.text: So I should pay by the 13th to be safe?
What if the system crashes?
Noted—I’ll pay tomorrow.

qaPairs.usageNote: 预留处理时间避免延误

subScenes.name: 道别致谢
subScenes.description: 结束咨询时表达感谢与后续跟进

qaPairs.speakerText: You’re all set—just email me if anything’s unclear.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你都搞定了，有不清楚的随时邮件我。

responses.text: Thanks so much—you’ve been a huge help!
Appreciate it. I’ll shoot you an email if I get stuck.
responses.text_cn: 谢谢，卡住时我再发邮件。

responses.text: Cool, see you at graduation!

qaPairs.usageNote: 道别时表达感谢提升印象

qaPairs.speakerText: We’ll send your diploma in 6–8 weeks after conferral.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 学位授予后6到8周寄出毕业证。

responses.text: Will I get an email when it’s shipped?
responses.text_cn: 寄出时会发邮件通知吗？

responses.text: Thanks for walking me through this!
Got it, thanks!

qaPairs.usageNote: 结尾确认后续流程更安心
